categories: Category:Rogue One: A Star Wars Story actors

nodes.text: Beau Gadson is an English actress who played eight year old Jyn Erso in Rogue One: A Star Wars Story. In addition to portraying young Jyn, she is known for playing the recurring role of young Princess Margaret in the historical drama series The Crown. The young actress also appears in the music video for Harry Styles' 2017 song "Kiwi". Beau is the older sister of Dolly Gadsdon, who plays four year old Jyn.[source?]
